channel.title: Weapons Dissapeared
channel.description: After fighting my way through the tunnel after the lobby battle in 'Questionable Ethics' I went to open the large blast door at the end of the tunnel and lost ALL my weapons. I reloaded the quicksaves and the game itself several times (my last actual save is waaaaaaay far back). I can spawn weapons for myself with the console and shoot them just fine, but I can't see them at all.

item.title: Weapons Dissapeared
item.dc:creator: Eltripas
item.description:
Same happened to me, loading an old save did the trick, I had to do the big battle of the lobby again though.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapons Dissapeared
item.dc:creator: wruffx
item.description:
After fighting my way through the tunnel after the lobby battle in ‘Questionable Ethics’ I went to open the large blast door at the end of the tunnel and lost ALL my weapons. I reloaded the quicksaves and the game itself several times (my last actual save is waaaaaaay far back). I can spawn weapons for myself with the console and shoot them just fine, but I can’t see them at all.
